analytic_model.name: OMR error model
analytic_model.description: Errors returned by the OMR process

concept.name: Low duration error
concept.description: The analyzed duration of voice element seems too low

concepts.concept: supDurErr High duration error The analyzed duration of voice element seems too high s

concept.name: Time inconsistency on system
concept.description: The detected time signature is not consistent on the system

concept.name: Key inconsistency on system
concept.description: The detected key is not consistent on the system

concept.name: Voice duration
concept.description: The voice may not have the correct duration
